      Intense futuristic arcade racer for the new generation!  Climb into
      the cockpit of a futuristic race craft and tear up the anti-gravity
      track as  battle commences  with over  30 real  and  AI  opponents.
      Offering  single and  multiplayer action,  Radial-G  delivers  full
      immersion racing on tubular tracks featuring  gut-wrenching twists,
      jumps, splits and unique inverted racing.

      For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/330770/
